comment._content: Benjamin F. Hoge, Captain of the 1913 Army Football team.  Unable to find anyone by the name of "Byrne" on the 1913 USMA Football roster.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- you have mis-titled the photo "Capt. Hodge," but his name was Hoge, as Bain gives it.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: TVL1970: Thank you for the information on Capt. Hoge. Wystan--We appreciate the connection of this image to the additional photos.

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Finally solved the mystery of "Byrne" in the photo.  He is Louis T. Byrne (USMA Class of 1914), younger brother of Eugene A. Byrne.  USMA Cadet Eugene A. Byrne died as a result of a broken back and paralysis he sustained in an October 1909 football game between West Point and Harvard.  Army canceled the remainder of  its 1909 football season after Cadet Byrne's death.
